abstract: Case against Israeli soldier who was captured on video fatally shooting wounded Palestinian assailant Abed al-Fatah al-Sharif in head has sparked furor in country and underlined challenge facing military as it seeks to quell surge in Palestinian violence; some 57,000 Israelis have signed petition calling for soldier to be given merit citation, even as many Israelis denounce shooting.

headline.print_headline: Soldier’s Killing of a Palestinian Polarizes Israel
headline.main: Israel Polarized Over Soldier Who Killed Wounded Palestinian

snippet: While many Israelis denounced the shooting, others expressed outrage at their military’s high command for prosecuting the soldier, calling him a hero.
lead_paragraph: While many Israelis denounced the shooting, others expressed outrage at their military’s high command for prosecuting the soldier, calling him a hero.
